name: serviced
content:

used to refer to a rented apartment, office, etc. that contains furniture and equipment, and has extra services provided such as cleaning and a reception (= the place in a hotel or office building where people go when they first arrive): The company offers privately owned and serviced apartments throughout Manhattan. They are working from a serviced office in town.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is a huge demand for serviced accommodation.We took a couple of serviced office suites in the city 15 months ago.The company is in the process of selling its core operation that provides serviced business space.
